title: The Humping Games
description: Katlick Eversweet hopes to compete in the 69th annual Humping Games. Sex is against the law in the twelve divisions and Katlick desperately needs to get some. Luckily, she is able to volunteer in her sister's place. The stakes are high and the sex is hot. Katlick joins Pita and the other contestants to see who can hump their way to victory.This is the hilarious and erotic parody of The Hunger Games. Reader discretion is advised.
author: Jack Gallow
